website_summaries.verdict: Though a bit overpriced, the Octa Vaccum Dock + WhaleTail Stand is a nifty accessory that works with all iPads and a variety of other tablets and e-readers.
pros: The Octa Vaccum Dock + WhaleTail Stand has an eye-catching design, is relatively lightweight, works with a variety of tablets, and its bendable tail allows you to prop up your device at various angles
cons: The stand is pricey, and it will not adhere to back cases that don't have a smooth surface

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift along with an Apple Ipad cover. To be sure the suction device worked with the cover I was contemplating purchasing, I called the company. The representative looked up the cover and suggested another non-porous cover to ensure proper suction. He then suggested that if I, or the recipient has any questions to call him. After purchase I received an email offering the same service. For service alone I would highly recommend this product. The functionality of the Whale Tale is impressive and excellent. The durability looks to be very good. It's light enough and small enough for transport. I would highly recommend this company and this product.
customer_reviews.author: CaliJoe

customer_reviews.title: Lots more flexibility!
customer_reviews.text: I feel the price is a bit high, but the product is ingenious--making my i-Pad so much easier to work with, providing a wonderful easel when at a table/flat surface or a handle when sitting on the couch! I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Roxborough Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased an Acer A510 tablet which has a rubberized textured back. I was a little uncertain about this handle as I feared that it would not be able to maintain a sufficient suction on the back. Well it can maintain a suction and holding and carrying the tablet is so much easier with this device. It's now possible to carry the tablet with one hand while using a stylus with my other to make notes using PDF editing apps. The whale tail also works great as an adjustable stand. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzdog

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and manipulate, works great for ipad mini also. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I wish it was a little smaller so it would be easier to take with you everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Rue

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed, except for...
customer_reviews.text: ... the suction. I get so many comments on the whale's tail! I really like using it and it does hold my pad at all the right angles. However, the suction part doesn't work as well as I'd hoped. I would think that the suction would hold for a day or 2, but I'm lucky if it holds a few hours (using the pad at work). The first one I had stopped holding suction for even a moment and Octa was fabulous about exchanging that part. The new one has held as good as it can for months. I've just gotten in the habit of pressing the button once or twice every few times I pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Godoi

customer_reviews.title: Clever stand, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and useful. Cool too and the directions booklet is hilarious
customer_reviews.author: medfordmom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Device
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the ipad. So easy to use and sleek in design. My kids love it and I love that it works so well. Some of the other cases or stands I've used in the past are just not that stable. This is! Buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Baltwo

customer_reviews.title: If you are planning to use this with Ipad 4 , Avoid this.
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried it , it used to hold my iPad for a day or less , But after one week , you do the suction and then right after you start hearing clicking noises and if your lucky it would stay 30 minutes. I am guessing this iPad 4 am using ( as advertised in the pictures ) , is that heavier than what the vacuum dock can handle. Avoid this product if your planning to use it with an ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Hamouri

customer_reviews.title: does what it supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Neat,l well made product. Saves strain on holding the ipad. I just think that the price is too high, otherwise it is a convenience. The whale is an added look to make it attractive. Bought through Amazon, but no discount - purchase from company has same price.
customer_reviews.author: nurse

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Faulty Whale Tail
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Whale Tail in August. After 'pumping' to fix the tail to my ipad the tail immediately started becoming unstuck, this was noted by the button coming out and making a clicking noise. I called Octa and they confirmed it was a faulty unit and I returned it and they sent me a new one. The new one has the same problems as before the only difference is that it now comes unstuck much faster than the first. Looks like a design fault with some units not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: pretty good initially but after six months and being sparingly ...
customer_reviews.text: pretty good initially but after six months and being sparingly used, this is what happened. Build quality is suspect. Just be prepared to use it for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: user990

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum didn't hold
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my wife's iPad. Design looked great - she loved it too...until we found...that the vacuum piece wouldn't hold the iPad well. It would hold fine for about an hour but then it would slip and the iPad would come crashing down on the table (or whatever other surface we had it on). She immediately stopped trusting the product and it became a door stop. Really upset - waste of $50.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Wishing it had better suction
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes based on other reviewers descriptions, but the bottom line is that this device doesn't consistently hold its suction. Despite how clean the device and iPad are the suction holds for an undefined amount of time. I am afraid to walk away from the device when I am using it to cook in the kitchen or even when I am sitting there watching a video. Seeing my iPad slip away is frightful! Who can afford that. When I get up and walk away for a few minutes, I need to know my iPad will still be where I left it (not lying on he floor).
customer_reviews.author: cookit

customer_reviews.title: It's a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The tail keeps losing suction. This is dangerous as the iPad keeps dropping. Don't think I'll be using it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Latham

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in June. It is now October. The suction stopped working. The company has not responded to my inquiry. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Objectivity

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASED AS A GIFT
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS AS A GIFT FOR MY SON & DAUGHTER-IN-LAW. IT DIDNT WORK OUT AT ALL FOR WHAT THEY WERE LOOKING FOR. THERE WAS NOTHING WRONG WITH THE PRODUCT PER SE, JUST NOT SOMETHING THEY WOULD USE
customer_reviews.author: colorado native

customer_reviews.title: Whale Tail
customer_reviews.text: This holder works well for me. The sample that i received for review fit my iPad Air with its case on. Using this with a case will be kind of hit and miss depending on the surface of the case itself. The suction cup needs a smooth surface to adhere to. Make sure your surface is clean and free of any oils. I could not get it to fail and drop my iPad like some of the others have experienced. It is a pretty neat looking stand, and find it works best for me when I use the iPad on my lap sitting in a chair. No negative issues to report after one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very elegant design
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Octa vacuum dock and whale tail on my iPad for a month now and I am completely satisfied. The design is perfect and the fit and fInish are first class. Very sturdy and the suction lasts all day and night. Just pump the device a few times in the morning and it stays firmly attached and ready to use in your hand or as a stand. The packaging is very thoughtful and as others point out it looks like an Apple product in this respect. If you are looking for a device to add comfort and functionality to your laptop, iPad, or e-reader the Octa vacuum dock and whale tail is a must have accessory.
customer_reviews.author: harvey

customer_reviews.title: Just plain awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this tonight from my daughter as an early Mothers Day gift. She really did her homework on this gadget...it is just what the doctor ordered. I have some hand issues which prevents me from holding onto my iPad or to even hold it into position for any length of time. This whale tail is everything I could possibly ask for.. It is just plain awesome. I can't find any place this won't work, maybe not upside down but every other way. Me and my hands thank the person who thought of it and my daughter for buying it for me. Get one. Today!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget to hold your tablet
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 tablet and it works great.I can also use with my iPad betterl The suction works fine.Simply do not push it and start pumping it till it stops. I also recommend that you pump occassionally to maintain the support.It is also a good idea to use it when watching a movie .
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: A Whale of a Product
customer_reviews.text: Dear to my tech-loving heart is the Octa Whale Tail! Not only is it the best friend to any tablet; I can see distant galaxies in its proprietary vacuum lock. Though you may not believe it, as one forays the digital information super highway, one may actually hear what the aliens there are thinking, just as one can hear the ocean in a sea shell, or if he listens close enough ... whale songs :)
customer_reviews.author: deadindenver

customer_reviews.title: COOL-looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: I admit that the main reason I chose the WhaleTail over other stands is that it is COOL-looking. The whole design-from-nature thing. I wasn't sure how it was going to work but as it turns out, I love it! I use my ipad on my desk at work and also in the kitchen when I'm cooking - the stand and the grip give me the flexibility I need to use it for different purposes/situations. I even find myself using the ipad a lot more now. Definitely 5-star.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca G.

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and Fun
customer_reviews.text: The Octa Vacuum Dock and Whale Tail are an impressive and useful set of accoutrements for any tablet. The Vacuum Dock is strong and comfortable in the hand, and the Whale Tail means I can set up my tablet anywhere I please. I especially enjoy traveling with this set, and I know my Octa products come with a promise of personal, quality customer service should I need it. I look forward to seeing what creative attachments you come up with next!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: My tablet's new sidekick
customer_reviews.text: I love my new dock. I've been looking for a way to hold my tablet and this one is the best on the market that I found. Nice look and solid function. I was surpirsed how long the vacuum lasts, I've had mine on for almost a week without pumping it and it's still solid! I know what my relatives are getting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boustead

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iPad holder/stand!
customer_reviews.text: What a great invention, I love my octa tail. I use it all the time at work in the medical field. During rounds, it is really handy to hold and put in orders on our electronic medical system. Also, the suction lasts a lot longer with a Zagg shield that I have on my iPad. I would recommend the octa tail to anyone with a tablet, not just a iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Jue Cao

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious device
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Vacuum Dock and Whale Tail about 3 months ago after seeing it on display at the MacWorld convention in San Francisco. I was getting tired of holding my IPad by the side and was afraid of dropping it. With the vacuum seal it is secure and provides me a different way of holding the tablet. It also acts as a stand and with the flexible whale tail it can be set an any conceivable angle for using. Count me in as an Octa fan-nice job !!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: What a great I idea!
customer_reviews.text: Remember when you needed a piece of paper and a piece of tape to stick a note on the fridge? Then along came Post-Its and the rest is history. Well, I use my iPad all the time and I'm always on the move, and until now I never really felt like I had a grip on the thing. Then a client told me about the WhaleTail. And, yes, the rest is history. Get yourself a Post-It and write yourself a reminder: "Order WhaleTail."
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kerim

customer_reviews.title: Whale of a product
customer_reviews.text: I love the one I have and want to get one for my wife - so get more in stock!! It's handy enough as a stand, but I carry my iPad around all the time and it's an awesome handgrip.
customer_reviews.author: James Cook

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, makes my iPad easier to use. I stuck it to my desk for fun and I had to use all my might to get it off! Very sturdy very sleek!
customer_reviews.author: craig w mueller

product_meta.title: TabletTail: Whale Kit (First Generation) - Stand & Handle for iPad, Tablet, and e-Reader
product_meta.description:
The TabletTail: Whale Kit provides a secure, one-handed grip on your tablet or e-reader. It transforms instantly into a powerful and sturdy stand. The dual-chamber vacuum suction system creates an unbelievably secure connection. Flexible and easy to use, the WhaleTail's lateral support ensures sturdy browsing at every typing or viewing angle. 

Comfortable: ideal grip size fits every palm 
Adjustable: quickly bends to any typing or viewing angle 
Sturdy: coated with gripping, slip-free materials for added stability 
Flexible: rigorously engineered, interlocking skeleton can be adjusted repeatedly 
Mobile: separates into two compact pieces for easy travel 
Case Friendly: works on smooth non-porous cases and skins 

Package Includes: 
Vacuum Dock 
WhaleTail 
Dock Cap 
Carrying Pouch that doubles as a screen cleaner 
Instructions
feature_bullets: Enjoy a secure, one-handed grip on your tablet or e-reader
Instantly transforms into a powerful and sturdy stand
Adjusts easily to any imaginable typing or viewing angle
Unbelievably secure vacuum connection from reliable dual chamber pump
Compatible with all iPad models, and many other tablets and e-readers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
